long_description: Give your feet a break with these full-length Spenco gel insoles that combine superior cushioning and energy return. Dual-density polyurethane gels and thermoplastic rubber absorb shock and return energy back to your feet. Low-friction top cloth helps reduce blisters and calluses and is treated with an antimicrobial agent to help control odor. Heel cupping provides extra cushion and stability for the heels. Slip-resistant materials keep insoles in place. Replaces original insoles or may be used on top of existing footbeds-trim to fit.
short_description: Give your feet a break with these full-length Spenco gel insoles that combine superior cushioning and energy return.
